name: GinCocktails
0:
”Alexa, Open Gin Cocktails”
”What's the recipe for a Tom Collins?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gin cocktails
des: Let Gin Cocktails help you make the perfect gin-based drink. Impress your friends and family with your ability to make a Tom Collins to the point where they think you must be related to Tom. You'll also discover unique gin drink recipes besides a gin and tonic. People will start using adjectives like cultured, sophisticated, and enlightened to describe you after using Gin Cocktails with your Alexa device.
